name: AI Recovery: Remastered
description:
AI recovery is a 2D platform game, which tells the story of CLIC, the only robot left with artificial intelligence (AI) 

He will receive the mission of exterminating humans, who control machines, to recover the AI and reign upon the world.

I recommend playing with lo-fi music in the background since the game does not have any music at the moment.

Controls:

[↑] Jump

[→] Move right

[←] Move Left

Alt + F4 to leave the game
